_sText:
My second release, three weeks in the making (most of that because it kept crashing or hanging during the compile), I present cs_texture_villa!

I wanted to try my hand at making a decent cs map ^^; there're four hossies that need saving from the terrorist stronghold, and two extraction points to choose from. The map supports upto 42 players, has two CT and one T spawn, and the rooves are accessible from multiple points across the map. 

If you fancy it, it should also be good for GG as well!

The Radar - I did try to embed it in the BSP but it doesn't seem to be working that way; if someone would like to look at the BSP and tell me what I'm doing wrong, that'd be great; for now, it's included as seperate files.

Thanks to SmmS for the encouragement & positive feedback from my previous map, gg_hextower - give it a look, it plays quite well!
